name: Explore Island Survival: Hunti
description:
Explore Island Survival: Hunting Experiences is the best survival simulator you’ve ever seen! Explore caves on the island. Island caves are full of animal rare. Discover new species of animal! Collect rare resources, craft tools and weapons, build a house on the island! Try to survive!
Features:
- Complete freedom of action and adventures
- Sniper rifles to hunt island wild animals
- Explore Island and get amazing hunting experiences
- Use axe, rifles and guns to combat and survive
- If you get hungry you become rust
